titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiesties proclamation, declaring her princelie intention to inhibit her subiects vpon most extreme paines, from offending on the seas any persons in their ships or goods, being the subiectes of any prince, potentate, or state, in amitie with her Maiestie.
Proclamations. 1591-02-03
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Forbidding piracy against ships of allies, with procedures for verifying lawful prizes--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
